title: Lilacs in the spring
brief_description: Based upon the stage production of Robert Nesbitt’s “The Glorious days” by Harold Purcell with original music by Harry Parr Davies. This is a song and dance romantic comedy set in London during WWII starring the ever-charming somewhat older Errol Flynn, along with Anna Neagle, David Farrar, Kathleen Harrison, Peter Graves and Helen Haye.
